Turf EQualized scoring

Round 2024-09 (Alt 2)

<< 2024-08 --- 2024-10 >>

EQualized scoring: Everyone gets 100 PPT and no PPH or yellow bonus. There is a small bonus for number of taken zones during a month (max 8000 zones). There is also a bonus for taking lots of zones the last 24 hours (max 400 zones). The max bonus can be another 100 PPT so a total of 200 PPT. This counts taken zones, not held zones. It does not matter if you lose your zones. No disadvantage in towns with high turf activity and low PPT. Unfairness that still remains - uneven distribution of zones.

Columns left to right: [Placement difference], [EQplace], [Turfplace], [Name], [EQscore], [% diff], [Turfscore].
